description: Whomever said 'lightening never strikes twice' must have never met Cooker. That ear-to-ear grin & bad boy twinkle as he talks about a sexual resume that would even make Ron Jeremy jealous...well let's just say he's one of the few models that had us rock-hard even during his biography video. Fresh from work in his chef's coat and apron, he quickly got more comfortable showing off very clearly why's he the Triple Crown winner of the Sexy Stud Derby: he's handsome, he's horny and he's packing nine thick inches that he's not to shy to measure right on camera. Nor was he too shy to bend over, putting that magnificent set of cheeks on display and show off that low-hanging sack that doesn't look as much like a set of baby makers but dual monuments of smooth, flesh colored pinatas overflowing with sperm. On the counter, on the floor, at the stove, even over the sink, that dick never goes down and his raunchy dirty talk never stops. He told us in his interview that he's known for his sauces and this time he proved it...grabbing a saute skillet, he criss crossed that whole pan with 5 plus rapid fire jets of Cooker juice as thick and creamy as that dick that made it. Dessert is served!
title: Very Special Sauce, Scene #02
